content: stripe and remove them at the end of the stripe begin bottom border cast on 206 sts work in garter st knit all sts for 11 row on the 12th row add stitch markers as follows knit 7 sts place marker knit 192 sts place marker knit 7 sts stripe 1 annette s rib by joanne 30 row at the beginning of row 1 of this pattern stripe attach a safety pin type marker to designate that this is the rs of the blanket you can move that pin up as you work row 1 rs k7 sm knit to last 7 sts sm k7 row 2 ws k7 sm p1 * k2 p2 repeat from * to last 10 sts k2 p1 sm k7 repeat row 1 & 2-- 14 times more for a total of 30 row worked ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 2 checkerboard by lynn - 30 row row 1 rs k7 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 2 ws k7 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 3-6 repeat row 1 & 2 twice more row 7 rs k7 sm * p6 k6 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 8 ws k7 sm * p6 k6 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 9-12 repeat row 7 & 8 twice more row 13 rs k7 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 14 ws k7 sm * k6 p6 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 15 18 repeat row 13 & 14 twice more repeat row 7-18 for a total of 30 row ending with a ws row total length will be 30 row worked ending with a ws row divider row knit 4 row slipping markers as you work stripe 3 diagonal texture by cindy 34 row row 1 rs k7 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 2 ws k7 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 3 k7 sm * p1 k3 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 4 k7 sm * p3 k1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 5 k7 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 6 k7 sm * k1 p1 repeat from * to last 7 sts sm k7 row 7 k7 sm k2 * p1 k3 repeat from * to last 9 sts p1 k1 sm k7 abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker sm = slip marker rs = right side ws = wrong side tbl = through the back loop k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together
